author: soap94
content: Hello friends, I really wanna start investing and using crypto on daily basis Please let me know what are the best ways to do it? Where should I start? Thanks a lot in advance!

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Using crypto every day for what, you own a business? Exchange platforms aren't too flexible as a medium of payment and can charge excessive fees.At least you state your preferences, using crypto isn't as easy as imagined, especially regarding local legality and of course there are some technical things that you need to learn.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: soap94 on March 20, 2023, 01:27:51 PMHello friends, I really wanna start investing and using crypto on daily basis Please let me know what are the best ways to do it? Where should I start? Thanks a lot in advance! I'm a bit confused about your intentions. Are you looking to invest in cryptocurrency or use it as a method of payment? While it's possible to do both, there seems to be a bit of a tradeoff between the two options. Investing in cryptocurrency involves holding onto it for potential future gains, while using it as a form of payment requires spending it now.Quote from: bitmover on March 20, 2023, 04:32:58 PMYou cannot use crypto in daily basis, there is no place in the world where you can every day buy stuff with crypto.Don't be so sure about that. It's not a stretch to say that living solely on cryptocurrency is possible, given the increasing number of stores and businesses that now accept it as a form of payment. In fact, I myself have been able to pay for groceries and bills with cryptocurrency. Additionally, with the availability of payment cards that can be topped up with cryptocurrency, it's becoming easier to fully embrace a crypto-based lifestyle.

comments.author: Lainta
comments.body: OP, Investing in cryptocurrency can be an exciting and potentially profitable endeavor, but it's important to approach it with caution and do your research. Before investing in any cryptocurrency, you should take the time to learn about the risks associated with it and how it works. Once you've selected a cryptocurrency you'd like to invest in, you'll need to choose a reputable exchange to purchase it. You should also set up a wallet to store your cryptocurrency after you purchase it, and practice good security habits to protect your investment.If you're interested in using cryptocurrency on a daily basis, there are several ways to do so. Many merchants now accept cryptocurrency as a form of payment, so you can use it to make purchases just like you would with a credit card or cash. Additionally, some companies offer cryptocurrency debit cards that allow you to spend your cryptocurrency anywhere that accepts traditional debit cards. You can also use cryptocurrency to send and receive money to friends and family around the world, with low fees and near-instant transaction times. Overall, investing in and using cryptocurrency can be a rewarding experience, but it's important to approach it with caution and stay informed about the latest developments in the market.

Where should I start? Thanks a lot in advance! I highly suggest using DEX if you want to trade in daily because. You can guarantee that your funds will never leave your wallet even if convert it on different currency. First you should define what Blockchain you want to use as your ecosystem for your trade. For starters, Binance Smart Chain is good for beginners because it has low transaction fee, fast transaction confirmation and vast number of dapps which you can choose to invest frequently.If your goal is to trade in regular basis, You should use an exchange that has a very active development to make sure that most of the projects has volume that you will for trading. Never use CEX to trade in daily basis because you will surely leave your assets inside the exchange which is very dangerous since you don’t have access to your  wallet private key.Do more research on DEX trading and find the perfect blockchain that suits your trading style. Good luck!
